price: 86. Mpe limbisa tata wa ngai mpo azalaki 0 kati ya babungi.
arabic: وَٱغۡفِرۡ لِأَبِيٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-igh'fir li-abī innahu kāna mina al-ḍālīna
